resources.string: Tilt and hold the joystick to observe movement.
Change direction. Can you see the Euglena respond?
Now try to get a Euglena in the ball!
Notice the ball begins tracking the Euglena, and the zoomed view above.
Notice the direction tracking and velocity.
If carried out of bounds, the ball resets!
Tap the screen to pass the ball in the direction of motion. Passed balls will bounce off walls.
Tip: If Euglena are about to go out of bounds, pass the ball to remain in play!
Now try to get the ball into the goal. Notice the countdown.
You can carry or pass the ball into the goal.
The score changed! 3 points for carrying the ball in, 1 point for passing it in.
Take turns playing! Each player gets 30 seconds or until out of bounds. Then pass the joystick.
